de.tum.in.tumcampus.models.managers

Class LocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.models.managers.LocationManager

  • public class LocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Location manager, manages intelligent location services, provides methods to easily access the users current location, campus, next public transfer station and best cafeteria

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationManager(android.content.Context c) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCafeteria()
      Provides some intelligence to pick one cafeteria to show
      java.util.List<Cafeteria> getCafeterias()
      Returns the cafeteria's identifier which is near the given location The used radius around the cafeteria is 1km.
      (package private) int getCurrentCampus()
      Returns the "id" of the current campus
      (package private) android.location.Location getCurrentLocation()
      Tests if Google Play services is available and than gets last known position
      (package private) int getCurrentOrNextCampus()
      Gets the campus you are currently on or if you are at home or wherever query for your next lecture and find out at which campus it takes place
      (package private) android.location.Location getLastLocation()
      Returns the last known location of the device
      (package private) int getNextCampus()
      Queries your calender and gets the campus at which your next lecture takes place
      java.lang.String getStation()
      Returns the name of the station that is nearby and/or set by the user
      Geo roomLocationStringToGeo(java.lang.String loc)
      Translates room title to Geo HINT: Don't call from UI thread
